quad_classifier module¶

Training of the Quadratic Classifier

class quad_classifier.EventDataset(c, path_dict, n_dat, hypothesis=0)¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset

find_min_max()¶

Find the minimum and maximum of the data

get_mean_std()¶

Find the mean and standard deviation of the data and save to disk

Computes the invariant mass of an event

Les Houches Event file reader

load_events()¶

Load the datasets (eft and sm) from the les Houches event files.

Computes the rapidity of an event

class quad_classifier.MLP(architecture)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Set up the NN architecture

Inputs:

act_fn - Object of the activation function that should be used as non-linearity in the network. input_size - Size of the input images in pixels num_classes - Number of classes we want to predict hidden_sizes - A list of integers specifying the hidden layer sizes in the NN

forward(x)¶
training: bool¶
class quad_classifier.PredictorLinear(architecture)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Returns the function f(x,c) from the paper (Wulzer et al.) in the linear case

training: bool¶
class quad_classifier.PredictorQuadratic(architecture)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Returns the function f(x,c) from the paper (Wulzer et al.) in the quadratic case

forward(x, ctg, cuu)¶
training: bool¶
quad_classifier.loss_fn(outputs, labels, w_e)¶
Parameters

  • outputs – outputs.shape = (batch_size, 1), output in (0, 1)

  • labels – labels.shape = (batch_size, 1), labels in {0, 1}

  • w_e – w_e.shape = (batch_size, 1), w_e in [0, infty)

Returns

contribution to loss from a sample x ~ pdf(x|H_0,1)
